SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM HP_CUSTOM_BOARD WHERE 1=1 AND USE_AT='Y' AND HP_BOARD_MASTER_NO = #boardNo#
((TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%') OR (CONTENT_TEXT LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'))
TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
CONTENT_TEXT LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC,HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO DESC ) WHERE 1=1
CATEGORY = #searchCategory#

SELECT HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO, TITLE, READ_COUNT, TO_CHAR(REGIST_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') as REGIST_DATE, REGIST_ID, REPLY_REGIST_DATE, REPLY_MODIFY_DATE, USE_AT, CATEGORY, HP_BOARD_MASTER_NO, REGIST_NAME, ATCH_FILE_ID FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM HP_CUSTOM_BOARD WHERE 1=1 AND USE_AT='Y' AND HP_BOARD_MASTER_NO = #boardNo#
((TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%') OR (CONTENT_TEXT LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'))
TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
CONTENT_TEXT LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC,HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO DESC ) S WHERE 1=1
CATEGORY = #searchCategory#
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT_HTML, CONTENT_TEXT, READ_COUNT, TO_CHAR(REGIST_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') as REGIST_DATE, REGIST_ID, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_ID, ATCH_FILE_ID, REPLY_CONTENT_HTML, REPLY_CONTENT_TEXT, REPLY_REGIST_DATE, REPLY_REGIST_ID, REPLY_MODIFY_DATE, REPLY_MODIFY_ID, USE_AT, CATEGORY, HP_BOARD_MASTER_NO, REGIST_NAME FROM HP_CUSTOM_BOARD WHERE HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO=#customNo# AND HP_BOARD_MASTER_NO = #boardNo#

SELECT PRE_HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO AS HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO, PRE_TITLE AS TITLE FROM ( SELECT HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO, TITLE, LAG(HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO,1,NULL) OVER (ORDER BY HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO) PRE_HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO, LAG(TITLE,1,'다음글이 없습니다') OVER (ORDER BY HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO) PRE_TITLE FROM HP_CUSTOM_BOARD WHERE USE_AT='Y' AND HP_BOARD_MASTER_NO = #boardNo# ) WHERE HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO = #customNo#

SELECT PRE_HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO AS HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO, PRE_TITLE AS TITLE FROM ( SELECT HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO, TITLE, LEAD(HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO,1,NULL) OVER (ORDER BY HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO) PRE_HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO, LEAD(TITLE,1,'이전글이 없습니다') OVER (ORDER BY HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO) PRE_TITLE FROM HP_CUSTOM_BOARD WHERE USE_AT='Y' AND HP_BOARD_MASTER_NO = #boardNo# ) WHERE HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO = #customNo#

SELECT HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO as articleNo, TITLE as title, CONTENT_HTML as contentHtml, CONTENT_TEXT as contentText, READ_COUNT as read_cout, TO_CHAR(REGIST_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') as REGIST_DATE, MODIFY_DATE as modifyDate, MODIFY_ID as modifyId, ATCH_FILE_ID as atchFileId, REPLY_CONTENT_HTML as reply_contentHtml, REPLY_CONTENT_TEXT as reply_contentText, REPLY_REGIST_DATE as reply_registDate, REPLY_REGIST_ID as reply_registId, REPLY_MODIFY_DATE as reply_modifyDate, REPLY_MODIFY_ID as reply_modifyId, CATEGORY as category, HP_BOARD_MASTER_NO as boardNo, REGIST_NAME as writerName, REGIST_ID as writerId FROM HP_CUSTOM_BOARD WHERE HP_CUSTOM_BOARD_NO=#customNo# AND HP_BOARD_MASTER_NO = #boardNo#
